scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-cfg
scripts.copy-cfg: find backend -maxdepth 3 -type f \( -name "*.arc-config" -o -name "package.json" \) | cpio -pdm --quiet dist && cp -rf dist/backend/* dist/. && rm -rf dist/backend
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently npm:watch npm:serve
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && arc deploy production
